exercises.text: Your friend is asking you some questions about your trip to France.
Now, your new friend knows a lot about you. Don't forget to ask some questions about her, too. Go ahead.
expectedAnswers: How about you? What is your name?
How about you? What's your name?

exercises.text: Me? My name's Lisa. Thanks for asking!
expectedAnswers: So, where are you from, Lisa?

exercises.text: Well done! Your friend is happy that you've shared your experience with her.
